short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aggregates the top news items from Hacker News and Reddit /r/programming

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects the top news items from Hacker News and Reddit /r/programming with a green, black and grey terminal theme. Allows the user to keep a reading list of 100 items for later viewing.
